pros: Family based duty station, work and personal life balance
cons: Very low salaries for the coordinator position

pros:
high level of salary comparing with other small INGOs but still less comparing to big ones
huge portion of experience within short period of time
cons:
huge, really insane workload (you do all - from HR to Logs, from project designing to monitoring - often alone because of lack of workforce - turnover is high)
quick burnout
involvement in all aspects of work, no matter are you specialist in it or not - you will be doing it
work really differs if you come here from huge organizations like UN - you are getting crazy from workload soon
